channel.title: Comments on: Sand Box for the Carbon BAsed Currency End Game?
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: President Trumps Remarks to the New York Economics Club Yesterday. A look back to his pre-election Speech at the same venue. “It’s The Money Power Stupid, The Gnomes of Zurich, it was ever thus! “Ceterum censeo Carthaginem esse delendam, nih

item.description: […] Roger Lewis7 April 2017 at 12:56 Syria is all about Gas, not poison Sarin Gas but Gas Pipelines. It is also not about Hydro Carbons in themselves but the market for hydrocarbons and which currency contracts of supply are settled in otherwise known as, US petrodollar hegemony. https://letthemconfectsweeterlies.blogspot.se/2017/04/sand-box-for-carbon-based-currency-end.html […]

item.title: By: Roger Lewis
item.dc:creator: Roger Lewis
item.description: Syria is all about Gas not poison Sarin Gas but Gas Pipelines. It is also not about Hydro Carbbons in themselves but the market for hydro carbons and which currency contracts of supply are settled in otherwise know and US petro dollar hegenomy.
item.content:encoded: Syria is all about Gas not poison Sarin Gas but Gas Pipelines. It is also not about Hydro Carbbons in themselves but the market for hydro carbons and which currency contracts of supply are settled in otherwise know and US petro dollar hegenomy.
